Class QuestionAnsweredEvent

java.lang.Object
com.bitbybit.logging.QuestionAnsweredEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEvent
public class QuestionAnsweredEvent extends Object implements GameEvent
Represents a game event indicating that a player has answered a question. This event carries details about the player, the question, the correctness of the answer, the answer given, points earned, and the player's running score.

  • Constructor Summary

    Method
    Description

    Returns the Player associated with this event.

    Returns the ID of the player associated with this event.
    int
    getPointsEarned()
    Returns the points earned (or deducted) for this answer.
    Question
    getQuestion()
    Returns the Question associated with this event.
    int
    getRunningScore()
    Returns the player's total score after this question.
    String
    getType()
    Returns the type of this game event, which is "QUESTION_ANSWERED".
    boolean
    isCorrect()
    Checks if the answer given was correct.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionAnsweredEvent

      public QuestionAnsweredEvent(Player player, Question question, boolean correct, String answerGiven, int pointsEarned, int runningScore)
      Constructs a new QuestionAnsweredEvent.
      Parameters:
      player - The Player who answered the question.
      question - The Question that was answered.
      correct - true if the answer was correct, false otherwise.
      answerGiven - The answer provided by the player.
      pointsEarned - The points earned (or deducted) for this answer.
      runningScore - The player's total score after this question.
